text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
After classes, I'm on my way to the<n>training track when I
see a familiar<n>Umamusume accompanied by an<n>unfamiliar
one.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Whoooa! Uwaaah!

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text:
That building contains both the<n>musical department and
home ec<n>classrooms. Beyond that is the indoor<n>pool.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text:
Hokkaido was big, but I've never<n>seen a school this huge
before! I'm<n>sure I'll get lost at least once... no,<n>maybe five
times...

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Hm? Aren't you Team Sirius's<n>trainer?

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text: Hello there. It's nice to know you've<n>heard of me.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: A trainer?

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text:
Right. In order to run in the Twinkle<n>Series, you must belong
to a team run<n>by a trainer.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text:
This trainer manages Team Sirius,<n>which has produced
many G1 race<n>winners.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text:
S-so you're like some kinda master!<n>Hello! I'm Special
Week!

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text:
I wouldn't call myself that... But<n>anyway, what are you two
doing?

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text:
You see, I just transferred here from<n>Hokkaido. Suzuka
was giving me a<n>tour of the campus.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text:
But getting here's not enough to start<n>running races, huh? I
didn't realize I'd<n>have to get accepted to a team too...

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text:
In that case, I wanna join Suzuka's<n>team! That way I can
watch her racin'<n>up close and personal!

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text:
Um... You have to be scouted to join a<n>team. There's no
guarantee you'll get<n>into the team you want...

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text:
Wooow! Scouted?! Just like a<n>supermodel! Then I'll just
have to try<n>super-duper hard!
choice_data_list: Well, you've got energy on your side, at least.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Anyway, I think we should get going.

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text: Okay, see you around.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
After dominating in her debut race,<n>Silence Suzuka finished
in eighth at the<n>Yayoi Sho... I would love to ask her<n>what
happened, but...

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text: That's not my place.

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text: That's not my place.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Several days later, I stop by the<n>tryouts to scope out
potential talent.<n>While there, I recognize someone in<n>the
audience.

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text: Oh, are you here to watch the tryouts?

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text: Oh, are you here to watch the tryouts?

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text:
You're the trainer from Team Sirius.<n>That's right, I'm here
to watch Special<n>Week.

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text:
What a surprise this is. She just<n>transferred, so I didn't
expect to see<n>her on the roster.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
New students usually learn the basics<n>of running and racing
before<n>determining the right time for them to<n>tryout.

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text: Sounds like she really wants tobe on your team.

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text: Sounds like she really wants tobe on your team.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text:
It certainly seems that way... But she<n>also has a dream of
her own.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text:
She wants to run in the Twinkle<n>Series and become the best
racer in all<n>of Japan.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text:
I've only just met her, but I can<n>already tell that Special
Week faces<n>her dreams, her emotions...<n>everything head
on.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
As she says this, something in<n>Silence Suzuka's
expression looks...<n>almost sad. I marvel at how different<n>
her face is now compared to her<n>debut.

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text: You sound almost jealous there.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Huh?

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: I, well...

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text:
We've reached the third race of<n>today's tryouts. Each
racer has taken<n>their place in the gate.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Ah... It's starting.

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text:
Here comes number six, Special<n>Week! She makes up for
her late start<n>with an early spurt as she enters the<n>third
corner.

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text: She's closing in! Closer! Closer...<n>she's taken the lead!

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Special Week! She just might—

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text:
For a new transfer, she's got guts! I<n>can't even tell she's
new. And that<n>expression...

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text:
For a new transfer, she's got guts! I<n>can't even tell she's
new. And that<n>expression...

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Not just her expression... Her running<n>form itself seems to
embody her<n>dreams of coming to Tokyo and<n>becoming the
best in Japan.<n>However...

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text:
Wh-what's this? Special Week has<n>stopped in her tracks
and is now<n>waving at someone!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: I did it, Suzukaaa! I got first place!

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text:
Uh-oh! Sounds like she thinks she<n>crossed the finish line!
Now the rest of<n>the pack is passing her in quick<n>
succession!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Wh-what?!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text:
Um, I'll be training with you from now<n>on—the name's
Special Week! Thank<n>you for the opportunity!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
Whooooa! We got a new member?!<n>Special Week, can I call
you Spe?! Nice<n>to meetcha!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text:
To be honest, I was hoping to get into<n>Suzuka's team, but
well, I kinda<n>messed up in the tryouts...

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text:
But when Team Sirius' trainer<n>scouted me, I remembered
hearing<n>your team was really great too, so I<n>happily
accepted!

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
Ohooo... So we're not good enough to<n>be your first choice,
huh?

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Huh?! N-no, it's not like that! AlthoughSuzuka's team definitely was myfirst choice!

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: Well, tough toenails, 'cause you'restuck with us now! We'll turn youinto the most miserable racer inJapan!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Whaaaaat?!

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
C'mon! The hell you waitin' for?! If<n>you wanna be the best
in Japan, you<n>better start runnin'!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: O-okaaaay!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Her skills still need refining, but her<n>earnest desire to be the
best has<n>really made an impression on me.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
I realize now that I want to help<n>Special Week achieve her
dreams.
